author: Varun Mayya
title: Here Are the Top 3 Use Cases of Kling O1

author: Varun Mayya
description:
In this video, we’re going over some of the best prompt tips I’ve come to know. We first look at how prompt engineering is kinda like “world-building” where you give the AI so much context, reference, and examples that it’s forced to be creative.

From meta-prompting, deep research, and asking AI to write like you… to using it to spot gaps in your own thinking… we’ve covered it all.

And then finally, we explain why all of this matters for students and works best on an AI PC, because instead of asking your parents for monthly subscriptions, you can just get an AI PC powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra Processors and run open-source models like Llama locally.

Learn more about Intel® Core™ Ultra Processors here: https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/products/details/processors/core-ultra.html

00:00 - Introduction
01:52 - World Building
05:44 - Deep Research
08:41 - Meta Prompting
10:34 - Personas
12:39 - Gap Finder
14:21 - Preventing Hallucination
15:11 - Using Voice Notes
15:52 - Erase S
title: Top 10 Tricks to Prompt Better Than 99% of People | Prompting Masterclass
